name: video-volume-sync
description: Remember and synchronise the volume for videos on Facebook.
author: Nick Waelkens <hi@nick.plus>

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=development rm -rf dist/ && webpack -p --mode development && NODE_ENV=development npm run copy:assets
scripts.release: NODE_ENV=production rm -rf dist/ && webpack -p --mode production && NODE_ENV=production npm run copy:assets
